content: I orchestrate my mornings to the tune of coffee.
author: Terri Guillemets

content: Adventure in life is good; consistency in coffee even better.
author: Justina Chen

content: To me, the smell of fresh-made coffee is one of the greatest inventions.
author: Hugh Jackman

content: Science may never come up with a better office communication system than the coffee break.
author: Earl Wilson

content: Behind every successful person is a substantial amount of coffee.
author: Unknown
